feed.title: Walter VanderSchraaf
feed.subtitle: Multipurpose engineer with a broad skill-set, a team-first attitude, and a commitment to excellence looking for an opportunity to join a high-performing organization supporting open-source technology. Interested in solving health needs and remote education during the pandemic.

entry.title: my six words
entry.content:
Play Hard

Be Present

Forgive

Remember


If you had to summarize yourself in six words… Try it.
entry.summary: Play Hard Be Present Forgive Remember

entry.title: My latest endeavor
entry.content: This GitHub pages site is a work in progress while I learn the ins and outs of building a static site with Jekyll etc. Previously I’ve built sites based on Python (flask, django), RubyonRails, React/Nodejs. I’m a generalist and enjoy learning the different frameworks, stacks and new technology. I come from the Microsft .NET world and I’m preparing myself for the future of open-source and cloud computing. If you need someone who can wear many hats (QA/dev/mgr), send me an email WalterVanderSchraaf@gmail.com
